title: Picking the best Android smartwatch: Pixel Watch vs. Samsung Galaxy Watch 5
tags: google pixel watch vs galaxy watch 5
samsung galaxy watch 5 vs google pixel watch
description: It used to be that Samsungs smartwatches were the best for Android users. But now that the Google Pixel Watch has arrived, which one is actually the best Wear OS smartwatch?
